note.p: Clergyman. BA, Cambridge (Queens’ College), 1844; fellow, 1847–50. Ordained priest, 1847. Tutor and principal, St Mark’s College, Chelsea, 1844–50; principal of the Collegiate School, Wandsworth, 1850–61. Bishop of Honolulu, Hawaii, 1861–70; rector of Oakley with Croxall, Derbyshire, 1872–96.
